dublin_core.dcvalue: The work addresses technical aspects of the assessment of exposure to electromagnetic fields EMF in the environment based on cellular telephony systems In this paper EMF parameters important to the biosphere exposure are discussed and the methods for the EMF assessment theoretical analysis of EMF intensity in the proximity of EMF sources and also the measurements in situ are described The review of measurement methods identification of limitations of measuring devices estimation of the expected EMF intensity in the municipal environment and environmental measurements uncertainty are presented M
[Technical possibilities of estimating the environmental exposure to electromagnetic fields for biomedical investigations based on cellular telephony systems].
